modName: Fantabulous FXAA - The Ultimate FXAA Settings
summary: Love the look of ENB\'s but hate the FPS loss? Good news! These settings get you those beautiful Vistas without that painful FPS loss!
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i188.photobucket.com/albums/z286/greencaleb1/NewFXAAAd800x450.jpg[/IMG]
[color=Orangered ]Note:[/color] [color=Lightsteelblue ]All pictures taken by me, were taken with Project Tamerial. Using vanilla or other lighting mods may change the look entirely. 
No ENB\'s were used during my shots.[/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]What Does this Mod Do?[/b]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=Powderblue ]Fantabulous FXAA uses the magnificent Injector created by Some_Dude to produce eye catching saturation, and exposure all the while applying a form of Anti-Ailsing know as FXAA. 
This mod seeks to mimic(As best it can) the beautiful lighting, saturation, exposure that many ENB\'S produce, but without the HUGE cost that most ENB\'s require. Think of Fantabulous FXAA as the bargain brand of Milk you buy at your local Super Market. It looks and tastes nearly the same as the leading brands, but without the cost.I\'ve wasted to many an hour crafting the Crispest, Most Vibrant, and Photo-Realistic Settings for the FXAA Injector I could muster, all  for you!(And me of course ;D)

[i]So, if you\'ve tried ENB\'s in the past but fallen short, disliked FXAA Settings before, or have always envied those with better computers then you, Give this little power house a go, and see just what it can do for your skyrim![/i]
[/color]

[color=Darkturquoise ] I would love to see how this is working on your computer, why not come back and upload a picture or two?[/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Will this Cause Lag?[/b]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=Powderblue ]No. Or very little, the FXAA injector is very Computer friendly, I\'ve seen no loss on my Rig, and at most I\'d say possibly a loss of 5 fps, but I doubt even that much.[/color]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]I don\'t like your settings, can I change them?[/b]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=Powderblue ]Yes! The FXAA Injector comes with easy to use sliders that you can use while playing(Or not) to alt-Tab out and change various settings and then go back in to see the results. Who knows you might make a better combination then me![/color]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Installation![/b]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=Powderblue ]Yes, yes that\'s all and good, how do I get this damned thing to work!?
It\'s very easy to install.

1. Download the FXAA Injector and run through it\'s Installation. 
Found here:  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/131]FXAA Injector[/url]

2. Download the file(Do not use NMM).

3.Find the file and extract its contents directly to your skyrim main folder where your skyrim exe is.(Do not extract to Data!)
Usually found in these locations:
(64bit) C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim
(32bit) C:\\Program Files \\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

4. Enjoy!
 Remember use Full-Screen and don\'t forget to turn your other anti-aisling\'s off!
[/color]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b] Uninstalling[/b]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=Powderblue ]1. Find the uninstaller in the MAIN skyrim folder, and click it.[/color]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Recommended Mods[/b]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=Powderblue ]If you want your skyrim to look like mine, you\'ll need a few mods.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting[/url]
Best lighting mod I\'ve ever seen, hands down.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7059]Sexy whiterun[/url]
I was surprised when I fell in love with his renditions of cities, but they really do fit in quite well.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4964]Optishooter\'s - Terrain Bump[/url]
Lovely mod that impoves terrain, while keeping fps loss to a minimum.[/color]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Compatibility.[/b]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=Powderblue ]Should be compatible with every mod, including ENB\'s, though other FXAA settings with overwrite these.[/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Troubleshooting.[/b]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=Powderblue ]1.If you\'re having any sort of trouble, make sure all other anti-aisling is off.
2.Make sure you\'re in Full-Screen.
3.Make sure you extracted the files contents to the MAIN skyrim folder with the .exe in it!
4. If you\'ve tried all those, leave a comment, thanks![/color]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Author Note.[/b]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=Powderblue ]This is of course catering to my tastes in a visually enhancing mod, what I think is pretty, you may find ugly, I simply ask you try the mod out, delete it if you dis-like it. I made this for me, and felt other might enjoy it as well, hence me sharing it with you all.[/color]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Permissions.[/b]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=Powderblue ]If for some random reason you wish to use this somewhere, please feel free to hit me up with a Private message![/color]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Credits![/b]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=Powderblue ]Kudos to Bethsheba for their landmark games!

Kudus to Some_Dude for creating the FXAA Injector!

Kudos to retspadez

One last kudos to  Kyokushinoyama(Creator of Vibrant ENB) for inspiring me to improve my current FXAA settings and essentially create this.
[/color]
author: Greencaleb1
